tailor.address: No. 72 Tapa Street, IjeshaTedo, Surulere, Lagos,
tailor.description:
We’ve come a long way since launching our mobile app back in 2017. But ultimately, we learned that the bulk of designers were still choosing to utilize the Dribbble web product over the mobile app experience.

In an effort to give you the best possible Dribbble experience, we’ve made the hard decision to sunset the mobile apps and focus efforts on improving the core web product for the community.
